H0.text: What is the name for the dot on the lower case letters I and J. Dotlet

H1.text: What is the name for the dot on the lower case letters I and J. Punctum

H2.text: What is the name for the dot on the lower case letters I and J. Diacritic

H3.text: What is the name for the dot on the lower case letters I and J. Tittle

A4.text: The tittle or superscript dot is the dot on top of lowercase i and j.

A5.text: In English writing the tittle is a diacritic which only appears as part of these glyphs, but diacritic dots can appear over other letters in various languages.

A6.text: The tittle (dot) on the letter ⟨i⟩ or the letter ⟨j⟩, of the Latin alphabet originated as a diacritic to clearly distinguish ⟨i⟩ from the minims of adjacent letters.
